Issue filed automatically.

See https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/blob/master/docs/reproducing.md for more information.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.
I could not reproduce this with Chromium's libxml2_xml_read_memory_fuzzer at r463162.

Issues 1010, 1011, 1014, 1017, 1026, 1049, 1066, 1074, 1076
seem to be caused by a bug in msan interceptor for iconv(). 
Fixed in http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project?rev=300010&view=rev, 
let's see if ClusterFuzz agrees. 

Sorry for the noise.

ClusterFuzz has detected this issue as fixed in range 201704101614:201704130557.
